title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 425.8 - Posted notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 425.8 - Posted notice

State Regulations

The board shall cause to be conspicuously displayed, on a
bulletin board at each access location, a notice clearly indicating: (a) the chairman of the Workers' Compensation

Board; (b) the records access
locations, times and officers designated by the chairman of the Workers'
Compensation Board; (c) the
schedule of applicable fees; and
(d) the right of a requester to appeal a
denial of access and an outline of the procedure to be followed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
425.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
